name: SIR ZIP, the rope rider
description:
Web version is limited: some sound doesn't work. gamepad doesn't work.

SIR ZIP, the rope rider

a game by idbrii & siskavard

Controls

Gamepad:        

  • RB/X -- Fire rope 
  • LB/A -- Jump    
  • LS -- Move      
  • RS -- Aim rope  

Keyboard:

  • mouse1 -- Fire rope
  • mouse2/Space -- Jump
  • wasd/arrows -- Move
  • mouse -- Aim rope
Additional Credits

Font: Humble Fonts Free - Eeve Somepx

Music: Sunra - Submergence - CC by-nc-sa 3.0)
